In order to give a chance to all the Consulting Firms to come clean, it had been decided to announce a Voluntary Scheme by the NHAI. As per this scheme; any Consulting Firm who has knowledge Or come across fakelincorrect/inflated CV make use of this scheme by the end of October, 2014. It has also been stipulated that Consulting Firms may refund the salary and perks drawn in respect of persons whose CV has turned out to be fakelincorrectinflated: 3 t has further been decided that all future RFP of   consultancy assignments shall incorporate the provision that in case CV of a person is turned out to be fakelincorrectlinflated during the assignment, the consultancy firms shall have to refund the salary and perks drawn in respect of the person apart from other consequences: In respect of consultancy assignment for which the bids have been received, this  aspect be incorporated in the contract agreement at the time of award. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority, NHAI (V.KSharma) Chief General Manager (Coord,) To All officers and employees of HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices: H1 RT RT 9I NHAL may may
